hooks.command: file_path=$(jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // empty' 2>/dev/null); if [[ -n "$file_path" && -f "$file_path" ]]; then if [[ "$file_path" == *.rs ]]; then rustfmt "$file_path" 2>/dev/null || true; elif [[ "$file_path" =~ \.(ts|tsx|js|jsx|json)$ ]]; then npx prettier --write "$file_path" 2>/dev/null || true; fi; fi
